name: once upon a time
description:
Anthotype is a natural photo printing technique using light sensitive plant extracts. No chemicals are used in this environmentally friendly alternative printing technique discovered by John Herschel. We just need plants and sunlight.

In this part of the series I created from found photographs, beet juice was used. 

Photographs produced by this method continue to fade as they are exposed to light, eventually disappearing.  just like the people in the albums…
